parameters.query:
SELECT id, review_id, review_content, rating, created_date, product_category
FROM raw_reviews
WHERE rating >= 4.0
ORDER BY rating DESC, created_date DESC
LIMIT 50;

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO evening_messages (scored_review_id, message_date, original_review, formatted_message, commentary)
VALUES ({{$json.id}}, CURRENT_DATE, '{{$json.review_content}}', '{{$json.formatted_message}}', '{{$json.commentary}}')
ON CONFLICT (message_date)
DO UPDATE SET
  scored_review_id = EXCLUDED.scored_review_id,
  original_review = EXCLUDED.original_review,
  formatted_message = EXCLUDED.formatted_message,
  created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
